item.title: CVE-2023-44386|2024-09-19T17:58:26.048Z -- vapor -- vapor
item.description: Vapor is an HTTP web framework for Swift. There is a denial of service vulnerability impacting all users of affected versions of Vapor. The HTTP1 error handler closed connections when HTTP parse errors occur instead of passing them on. The issue is fixed as of Vapor release 4.84.2.
